name: Machvise
text: On Play: If your leader is the (Donquixote Pirates) type, rest up to one of your opponent's 5 cost or lower characters. Then, at the end of the turn, set up to 1 of your DON!! as active.

effect.text: If your leader is the (Donquixote Pirates) type, rest up to one of your opponent's 5 cost or lower characters. Then, at the end of the turn, set up to 1 of your DON!! as active.

meta.notes: Rarity is printed as 'C' in a box in the bottom right corner. The card is a sample, indicated by the watermark.
